domains.description: Ensures data is collected, standardized, integrated, and made accessible across the enterprise.

attributes.definition: Provides golden records for customers, products, suppliers, and other entities.
Tracks business, technical, and operational metadata including lineage.
Supports ETL/ELT pipelines, API ingestion, and streaming from multiple sources.
Ensures data is cleansed, validated, and fit for purpose.

domains.description: Builds and manages pipelines to move, transform, and enrich data for analytics and machine learning.

attributes.definition: Enables both scheduled and real-time data processing.
Applies business logic, aggregation, and enrichment to raw data.
Manages scheduling, dependencies, and automation of data workflows.
Implements CI/CD practices, monitoring, and testing for data pipelines.

domains.description: Capabilities focused on prompt engineering, LLM fine-tuning, and RAG pipelines.

attributes.definition: Designs and refines prompts to optimize large language model outputs.
Customizes pre-trained language models on domain-specific data.
Coordinates retrieval augmented generation workflows with vector stores.

domains.description: Defines and enforces policies, model governance, access, privacy, and compliance for data and AI assets.

attributes.definition: Manages user roles, permissions, and secure identity verification.
Ensures adherence to regulations such as GDPR and industry standards.
Tracks data origins, transformations, and usage for traceability.

domains.description: Covers experimentation, model development, training, validation, and deployment processes.

attributes.definition: Records model parameters, metrics, and artifacts across runs.
Centralizes feature definitions, storage, and access for models.
Conducts algorithm training and evaluates performance on test data.
Automates tuning of model parameters to improve accuracy.
Provides insights into model decision logic and feature impact.

domains.description: Enables users to explore, analyze, and visualize insights via dashboards and reports.

attributes.definition: Builds interactive dashboards and enables collaboration.
Allows users to create custom queries against datasets.
Automates generation and delivery of reports on a schedule.
Empowers non-technical users to analyze data without IT support.

domains.description: Supports CI/CD, monitoring, versioning, and operationalization of machine learning models.

attributes.definition: Tracks and stores different model versions in a registry.
Implements pipelines to deploy models into production.
Continuously tracks model accuracy, drift, and latency.
Schedules model retraining with new data to maintain performance.

domains.description: Facilitates data asset searchability, classification, and lineage tracking across the enterprise.

attributes.definition: Registers datasets, tables, and models in a searchable catalog.
Enables discovery of data via metadata keywords and tags.
Displays data flow paths from source to consumption.
